markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=1886) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Open" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=123" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 157 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=47)

**Prerequisites**
[Archer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1885)

</column>

---

You draw your bow and attack with the same action. You Interact to draw a weapon from the [bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3) weapon group that is loaded or has [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), then Strike with that weapon.
name: Quick Shot
